info.name: The Pirate Bay - Ad remover
info.description: Pretty quick and effective way to remove ads on The Pirate Bay. If you check this site frequently, you must acknowledge that those ads are irritating...

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);



@-moz-document domain("thepiratebay.am"), domain("thepiratebay.gd"), domain("thepiratebay.mn"), domain("thepiratebay.vg"), domain("thepiratebay.la"),  domain("uploadbay.org") {iframe {display: none !important;}}
